content:
During the day, March 11, Russian troops fired at the territory of ten regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

Rosarmia's troops attacked 101 settlements and 199 infrastructure sites from different types of weapons. In particular, mortars, tanks, artillery, RSZV, UAV, SCR and tactical aviation.

As a result of hostile shelling, they are dead and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Russians at nightreleasedOn the nitrus 6 S-300 missiles.
title: From mortars, tanks and artillery troops of the Russian Federation attacked ten regions of Ukraine
description: About it reports Military Media Center. Rosarmia troops attacked 101 inhabited ...
author: Army Inform
